QuestData.Title: No Bot Left Behind
QuestData.Description:
You left Earl-E behind, and a giant worm ate him! He's got sentimental, uh... monetary value.
We don't leave any bots behind!
Kill that worm and get Earl-E back.
QuestData.CompletionText: What? Earl-E isn't going to help himself!
QuestData.RewardText: You saved Earl-E! I am forever grateful $r.
